text: Princess Veronica is the only album released by The Saddle Club cast member Heli Simpson. The album includes Simpson's debut single, "Don't Ask Me". Prior to releasing the album Heli released the single for "Don't Ask Me". After "Princess Veronica" came out Heli released her only EP "Princess Veronica Tour EP". ==Track listing== # "The Way You Are" # "Don't Ask Me" # "I Want You To Know" # "Princess Veronica" # "A Girl Like Me" # "She" # "Sister To Me" # "All I Want" # "Can You Read The Sign?" # "No One Like You" # "Daddy's Little Girl" # "Holding Onto You" # "Crazy" # "There's Always Room For Love" # "Money Can't Buy" (Bonus Track) ==Charts== The album only spent one week inside the top 100 Australian albums chart. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chart (2004) ! Peak position |- | ARIA Albums Chart | align=center|75 |- | ARIA Australian Albums | align=center|16 |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Country ! Release Date ! Format ! title: Princess Veronica
